properties.entry: UPDATE /* 회원정보수정 */ MEMBER SET USER_NAME = ? , BIRTHDATE = ? , GENDER = ? , PHONE = ? , EMAIL = ? WHERE USER_ID = ?
UPDATE /* 비밀번호수정 */ MEMBER SET USER_PWD = ? WHERE USER_ID = ? AND USER_PWD = ?
UPDATE /* 회원탈퇴 */ MEMBER SET DELETE_STATUS = 'Y' WHERE USER_ID = ? AND DELETE_STATUS = 'N'
